title: Scolding no scholarship in the abyss, or, Groundless grounds of the Protestant religion as holden out by M. Menzeis in his brawlings against M. Dempster.
author: Abercromby, David, d. 1701 or 2.
notes: Attributed to Alexander Con but more likely by David Abercromby. Cf British museum catalogue.
A reply to: Papismus lucifugus / John Menzies.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
